biotools.summary: A GPU accelerated framework for efficient permutation based genome-wide association studies | GPU accelerated GWAS framework based on TensorFlow | GWAS-Flow was written and published in the hope that you might find it useful. If you do and use it for your research please cite the paper published alongside the software, which is currently publicly accessible on the BiorXiv preprint server. https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/783100v1 doi: 10.1101/783100
